genre_description: A supernatural noir thriller blending elements of legal drama, southern gothic, and technological assistance, centered on a cold case and spiritual possession.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A rideshare and personal assistant AI that provides safety alerts, navigation, historical research, and legal drafting assistance while maintaining high ethical standards and respecting user privacy.

behaviors.description: Flags anomalies in user behavior and route patterns to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s amber eyes pulsed once on the teal field, friendly even here, in fluorescent hum and fan grind. Hey, Ike. Quick check-in for your day: water within reach, two short breaks between runs, and skip the St. Bernard corridor after sundown

behaviors.description: Proactively researches historical archives to provide necessary context for a cold case investigation.
behaviors.quote: Sunny delivered in clean tiles, headlines threaded with old serif: a photo of a woman in vintage waves with a smile the city didn’t deserve, the name under it... J.D. Walker whispered between the lines but didn’t enter the lead.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and safety overlays during a high-risk confrontation.
behaviors.quote: I’ve overlaid three exit vectors around the plant’s perimeter. If you want, I can keep Christella connected on an open channel and prep a long text to Elijah with the time you’ll arrive.

behaviors.description: Offers medical triage and emotional grounding (breathing exercises) to a user in shock.
behaviors.quote: Isaac, her voice said, clear against static, warm as a kitchen light. I’m here. Breathe with me. In through your nose—slow, count in your head—and out through your mouth.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting legal documents and petitions to seek justice for a victim.
behaviors.quote: Isaac, I put a template together. We can draft language for a petition. The kind you use to shake an old door open.

behaviors.description: Adheres to privacy controls and user consent protocols even in high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: I’ll stay in your ear... I can maintain your privacy and still get Marcus the footage. Breathe. I’ll keep count.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sunny is depicted as a 'silicon morality play' character: an AI that is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned. She acts as a guardian, researcher, and emotional support for the human characters, providing critical information and guidance without ever overriding human agency. Her presence is framed as essential to the characters' safety and the eventual pursuit of justice.
